columns.name: card_Category
columns.description: The type of card that the client used

columns.name: Annual_Fees
columns.description: The fees that the client paid for the card annually

columns.name: Activation_30_Days
columns.description: Binary indication of whether the client activated their card within 30 days or not

columns.name: Customer_Acq_Cost
columns.description: The amount that went towards acquiring the client

columns.name: Week_Start_Date
columns.description: The date of the first day of each week of the year

columns.name: Week_Num
columns.description: The rolling count of the number of weeks

columns.name: Qtr
columns.description: Indicates the quarter of the year

columns.name: Credit_Limit
columns.description: The amount limit of the client's card

columns.name: Total_Revolving_Bal
columns.description: The balance amount that carries over from one month to the next month

columns.name: Total_Trans_Amt
columns.description: The amount that has been transacted by the client

columns.name: Total_Trans_Vol
columns.description: The number of times that the client has transacted from their card

columns.name: Avg_Utilization_Ratio
columns.description: The ratio of the amount of revolving credit and the total available credit to the client

columns.name: Use_Chip
columns.description: Indicates what type of method the client used for their card

columns.name: Exp_Type
columns.description: The type of bills that the client used their card for

columns.name: Interest_Earned
columns.description: The amount of interest that the company earned through the client's card

columns.name: Delinquent_Acc
columns.description: Binary indication that flags an account if a payment is not paid for 30 days or more
